channel.title: ~Revolutionize~
channel.description:
~Revolutionize~ [size=18pt]Reason for topic/ What this source is abought[/size]
[font=impact]Well To start off arnt You guys tired of Browsing Though the server download section and only coming to find Horibal Delta's or The same old PI. Well i am and thats why i starter this project Basicly im going to take a framework And code that from there coding the esentials for a good Runscape private server.[/font]
Ive Programmed Java for over 2 years now and have just recently started on runescape private servers and this will be my First official project. At the moment my current goals are to Create fully working skills Atleast the Main ones and Create an Incredebly Stable Base
[font=courier]Goals[/font] Green is Complete Currently Working on Havent Started yet
Adding PVN Support Adding PVP Support Adding Food/Potion Support
[font=georgia]No Need for pictures as atm its just a blank source But heres one anyway.[/font] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/25sohs7.png[/img]
Edit:i Have decided to youse Runesource as my base as it has shown to be Incredibaly Stable Holding Up To 1000 Bots Also I did not take this picture [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/24y9s47.png[/img]

item.title: ~Revolutionize~
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:7, topic:370420”]why do You randomly Talk like This?

Also, just because Rune-source held up to 1000 bots, doesn’t mean squat.

I’m pretty sure this is just a picture of R-S itself.[/quote]

Im pretty sure its because i havent updated this thread in awhile so why dont you gtfo my thread kthxbai.
And also if you must no i Broke my leg And was busy with that…

Read full topic

item.title: ~Revolutionize~
item.dc:creator: @Aeronity Aeronity
item.description:
@Aeronity wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:7, topic:370420”]why do You randomly Talk like This?

Also, just because Rune-source held up to 1000 bots, doesn’t mean squat.

I’m pretty sure this is just a picture of R-S itself.[/quote]

Rune-Source held 2048 players and updated them all while they were spamming random packets in about 35ms.

Are you talking about the ingame picture? If so, that’s retarded. It has no NPC spawns, the chat box is filled with messages like “You Teleport To Lumbridge”, and also in the chat box hes saying “Simple teleporting via command”.

Read full topic
